123122.content:
Violet Parr was sitting in class bored out of her brains. It was only first period, but literally the day before she had been saving the city from syndrome with her family and she was pretty eager to get out of class and go fight bad guys. She sighed as she focused on her work. “Gosh I hate learning about photosynthesis,” she mumbled as she started working through the worksheet. Little did she know, she would have to fight soon, and it wasn’t the kind she had hoped for. Violets tummy grumbled as she was working through scenario #21 on her paper. Grimacing and placing a hand on her stomach, she winced as a silent fart left her rear end. She also felt a twinge in her bladder, demanding the release of the water she had at before bed yesterday. info.brief_description: In this story, you join each of the incredibles as they are desperate for the toilet.
info.description: In this story, you join each of the incredibles as they are desperate for the toilet. What do they need to do? Do they make it? It’s up to you. No sexual themes, just pure potty desperation and accidents. In case of copyright, incredibles owned by Disney and this is only made for entertainment.
